tests.title: test case: check placeholder
tests.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: check placeholder
tests.code:
const element = await driver.findElement(By.css('input')).getAttribute('placeholder');
assert.equal(element, "Enter your delivery address", `Ensure you have the placeholder as seen in the mock-up`);

err.message: AssertionError: Ensure you have the placeholder as seen in the mock-up: expected 'Enter your location' to equal 'Enter your delivery address'
err.estack:
AssertionError: Ensure you have the placeholder as seen in the mock-up: expected 'Enter your location' to equal 'Enter your delivery address'
    at Context.<anonymous> (landing_page.js:114:20)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:97:5)
err.diff:
- Enter your location
+ Enter your delivery address

tests.title: test case: check label of input-field
tests.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: check label of input-field
tests.code:
const element = await driver.findElement(By.css('body')).getText();
assert.include(element, "Where are you?", `Ensure you have the input field as the appropriate label as seen in the mock-up`);
